name: German Soft Pretzels
ingredients: 2 tsp yeast ¾ cup warm water
steps: In mixing bowl, dissolve yeast in warm water and sugar. Wait for 2 minutes, add salt.
Using the dough hook, blend in the flour and mix until dough is smooth.
Divide dough into 4 pieces and roll pieces into ropes. Twist ropes into pretzel shapes and place on
Brush the tops of the pretzels with beaten egg. Sprinkle tops with coarse salt.
